register.heading: Register
register.name: Name
register.totp.information: Please add this QR code to one of the authenticator applications (Microsoft Authenticator, Google Authenticator..) and use it as 2-nd factor to log in.
register.backup.codes.information: As an alternative to log in we generated one-time passwords in case you forget your password or loose your 2-nd factor device (If you use 2FA authentication). Please save them and put them in the safe place
